title: Sri Lanka beat Australia by 5 wickets in 5th T20I
content: Sri Lanka defeated Australia by 5 wickets in the fifth and final T20I game between the sides at Melbourne Cricket Ground on Sunday. Kusal Mendis' unbeaten 69 off 58 took the guests home despite Australia staying in the contest till the final over of the game. Sri Lanka chased down 155-run target to taste their first victory in their tour to Australia that included series of 5 T20I matches.
